website_summaries.verdict: With fewer ruffles and more clean lines, this skirt would go well in a unisex nursery.
pros: A look that's less frilly, more structured and unisex
Designed for standard cribs measuring 28 inches by 52 inches
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: May shrink in dryer, so consider air-drying instead

customer_reviews.title: Good crib skirt for a great price
customer_reviews.text: We were looking at purchasing a 150.00 crib skirt from restoration hardware when I came to my senses and realized that it was a waste of money. I found this one which looks almost identical to its more expensive counterpart and figured I’d give it a try. I didn’t wash it after reading the reviews of it shrinking but that’s ok because the baby will never touch it anyway. I ironed it and put it on and it fits perfectly. I wish it was a little bit lighter in color but otherwise it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Audrafit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a boy or girl
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bedskirt! Bought it to go with the Nurture Imagination Nest bedding set, and it is a perfect light blue, a little longer than most skirts, and blends well for a soft look that works for a boy or a girl. The quality is also very high, higher in fact than the skirt that came with the set. It has a soft and durable cotton section that goes across the springs under the crib mattress, as opposed to a stiff, almost mesh like material that so many have now. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jflakes

customer_reviews.title: Not right size.
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the picture, but it isn't long enough for the front part of the crib. It isn't noticeable on our crib because each side has a thick corner piece but if you have skinny rails then one side would show the corner of the metal piece that holds the mattress.

product_meta.title: Burt's Bees Baby - Crib Skirt, 100% Organic Crib Skirt for Standard Crib and Toddler Mattresses (Blossom)
product_meta.description: Color:BlossomSweet dreams come easy on our soft and cozy 100% organic crib sheets, and organic cotton means that parents can rest easy too. Mix and match our gentle solids and prints for a gorgeous nursery as good for the planet as it is for the little one who sleeps there.
feature_bullets: TIMELESS STYLE - from handpainted watercolors and sophisticated modern prints, we never cease to be inspired by the natural beauty of the world around us. Keep an eye out for hidden bees as we honor the Burt's Bees heritage. Hand me downs have never looked so fresh!

SUPER SOFT - 100% organic cotton jersey knit is the coziest, most breathable fabric, perfect for an eco-friendly nursery. We use ring-spun cotton and an extra combing process to guarantee that our organic cotton fibers are super soft for a restful night's sleep.

NATURALLY HYPOALLERGENIC - Burt's Bees Baby GOTS Certified Organic products are responsibly made. We have the highest standards of third-party certification, authenticating that synthetic pesticides and harmful chemicals are kept out of the growing and manufacturing process. You can rest assured that you'll be outfitting your nursery in the softest and purest form of cotton.
FULLY FITTED - our crib skirts fit snugly around standard 28" X 52" crib and toddler mattresses. The center pleat adds a subtle touch of style.

DURABLE - our machine washable and dryable products get softer with every wash. We know that isn't going to make the chore any easier! But the idea of clean, softer bedding will make you look forward to washing and folding.
